var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};

    b = b.split(',');

            break;

        }

}

  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);

};

// è§£æåˆ†ç±»æ•°æ®
function parseCategory(data) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow] = data.split(separator);
  
  const fullUrl = /^\d+|natural/.test(url) 
    ? `http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%22${url}%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148`
    : url;
  
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// è§£ææ ‡ç­¾æ•°æ®
function parseTag(data, tagCategory) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow, tagType] = data.split(separator);
  
  let fullUrl = url;
  if (tagType === "bq") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=${url}&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  } else if (tagType === "at") {
  	fullUrl = `https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/authorColumn?authorid=${url}`;
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "class") {
  	fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token=${token}&order=1&classId=${url}&backupTime=${Date.now()}\"}`
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "lx") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=${url}&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  }
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// åˆ›å»º FlexBox å¯¹è±¡
function createFlexBox(title, url, num) {
  const flexBasisMap = { 1: 1, 2: 0.4, 3: 0.25, 4: 0.2, 5: 0.15, 7: 0.1, 10: 0.05 };
  return {
    title,
    url: url || '',
    style: {
      layout_flexGrow: 1,
      layout_flexBasisPercent: flexBasisMap[num]
    }
  };
}

	function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {

}

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }
